goals.title: Learn Competency Framework OWASP
goals.description: To learn the top 10 OWASP principles to at least a junior software engineering level and know where/how they are used within the BGL applications.
goals.keyActivities: Top 10 OWASP Principles, Where have any bee used in the BGL applications (examples?).

goals.title: Improve on presentation skills
goals.description: To improve my presentation soft skill to increase my confidence in public speaking.
goals.keyActivities: Present to a small audience (family/ friends). Present/run a .Net community meeting.

goals.title: Learn Vue.js
goals.description: To learn the basics of Vue.js.
goals.keyActivities: Create a static site using Vue.js. Possibly use this knowledge to run a session for .Net community.

goals.title: Develop knowledge on Powershell
goals.description: To learn more about Powershell and increase my knowledge on it.
goals.keyActivities: Try to create a powershell script to change settings on machines to set up for MA, and change back quickly.

goals.title: Apprenticeship
goals.description: Complete one evidence submission for portfolio work. Take a mock test for HTML, CSS and Javascript exam.
goals.keyActivities: One evidence submission will be submitted to Makers and one mock test will be completed with the result recorded.

goals.title: Technical
goals.description: Understand BGL coding standards, and apply these to tickets I work on within the team.
goals.keyActivities: Builds should pass with the code I have written as my tech lead and TeamCity will pick up any issues/bad practice code.

goals.title: Business
goals.keyActivities: Be able to discuss BGL's stratergy at a high level.

goals.title: Personal
goals.description: Get involved with the social committee and possible charity groups (e.g. STEM).
goals.keyActivities: Record involvment and success within the groups.

goals.title: Soft Skills
goals.keyActivities: Speak out in mobbing work and retros to express my ideas and methodology behind them.
